Title: WATCH: Union Station Kansas City lights up to welcome Patrick Mahomes' daughter
Description: Mahomes and Matthews announced to the world that their daughter had arrived, sharing the first photo of Sterling Skye Mahomes on Sunday afternoon. Later that evening, the iconic Union Station was lit up with pink and white lights to show their excitement and welcome the new member to the Mahomes household to Kansas City.
Author: USA Today on MSN.com
